meanings.definition: A type of traditional Moroccan slipper.
meanings.sent1: She wore comfortable babouches around the house.
meanings.sent2: The market was filled with colorful babouches for sale.
meanings.sent3: The babouches danced off her feet and onto the floor!
meanings.sent4: His babouches whispered softly as he walked through the quiet streets.
meanings.sent5: The babouches were as cozy as walking on clouds.

meanings.sent1: They each bought a pair of babouches to wear at the event.
meanings.sent2: The babouches lined up neatly by the door.
meanings.sent3: The babouches seemed to have a secret meeting in the closet.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of babouches was a rainbow of colors.
meanings.sent5: The sound of babouches echoed through the hallway.
